p: The fresh pomegranate pulp was obtained from a local juice factory. At the factory, the pomegranate fruits (Wonderful variety) were halved and squeezed mechanically. Approximately 300 kg of the residual part containing peels, seeds, membranes, and portion of arils was collected and dried in a ventilated oven at 40 Â°C until a constant weight. The dried pomegranate pulp was minced, and a representative sample was collected and analyzed for the chemical composition in order to establish the level of inclusion in the experimental concentrate.
